tool.name: SAGA.table_calculus.15
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayTABLE False isArrayFIELDS False output_data_STATISTICS $output_data_STATISTICS name SAGA.table_calculus.15 TABLE $TABLE FIELDS $FIELDS prefer $prefer response $response outputType_STATISTICS $OutputSection_STATISTICS.outputType_STATISTICS transmissionMode_STATISTICS $OutputSection_STATISTICS.transmissionMode_STATISTICS

param.name: TABLE
param.label: Table
param.help: The input table. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: FIELDS
param.label: Attributes
param.help: The (numeric) fields to calculate the statistics for. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_STATISTICS
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

tool.help: The tools allows one to calculate statistics (n, min, max, range, sum, mean, variance and standard deviation) for attribute fields of tables, shapefiles or point clouds.
